alert.note: Alert for Northern Carroll; Northern Coos; Northern Grafton; Southern Coos; Southern Grafton (New Hampshire) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued February 08 at 3:15PM EST until February 09 at 10:00PM EST by NWS Gray/Portland
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 3 PM TO 10 PM EST THURSDAY... * WHAT...Mixed precipitation expected. Total snow accumulations up to one inch, sleet accumulations between one tenth and two tenths of an inch and ice accumulations around a light glaze, with up to a quarter inch of ice at higher elevations. Winds gusting as high as 35 mph. * WHERE...Northern Carroll, Northern Coos, Northern Grafton, Southern Coos, and Southern Grafton Counties. * WHEN...From 3 PM to 10 PM EST Thursday. * IMPACTS...A period of mixed precipitation is expected with air temperatures slowly rising above freezing and changing to rain. Expect slippery road conditions and avoid travel if possible. Even light snowfall amounts can accumulate on roads and cause dangerous driving conditions due to snow covered roads. The hazardous conditions could impact the Thursday evening commute.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions can be obtained by going to newengland511.org

area.areaDesc: Northern Carroll; Northern Coos; Northern Grafton; Southern Coos; Southern Grafton
